content.question: Habes . . . petisti (line 11) is translated

choices.label: You keep in your mind everything that you seek
You have had everything you sought in your mind
You have what you sought with your whole mind
May you have all that you sought in your mind

content.answer: You have what you sought with your whole mind

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
